long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Number to words (VND). This utility to convert the number from selected text into words in Vietnamese (VND)
Usage:
1. Select number you want to convert in words
2. Right click and click "Thành tiền" from context menu (the converted result will be set to clipboard)
3. Paste (Ctrl+V) to text box you want to fill number in words.
